# Main

## Roger Rafael Castro Zambrano {#title}

An engineer with a background in geoinformation technologies, nowadays I strive to master R and other
programming tools, in order to better understand spatial phenomena. I am eager to produce educational
and scientific contents, since my goal is to develop an academic career.
